Authors: Li Wei, Yong-He Li, Rui-Lin Zhao, Kevin D Hyde
Title:
Micropsalliota pseudoglobocystis, a new species from
China
Abstract:
A new species of Micropsalliota, M. pseudoglobocystis,is
introduced from China. The species is described and illustrated and its
phylogenetic placement determined using molecular data. The new species
is compared with the most similar taxa in the genus. Micropsalliota is
also reported from China for the time.
